item.title: Troubleshooting load balancing issues with SharePoint
item.author: vbiret+blog@outlook.com (Vincent Biret)
item.description: A few weeks ago, I’ve had to get hands on a customer’s SharePoint farm showing performance problems. They also had inconsistencies with display data between multiple calls. I quickly suspected a configuration issue for the load balancer dispatching calls between the front-end servers. However, I only had access to the SharePoint farm and I had to provide data so the network team so they could start investigating. Hence the question: how can we determine which server served the request between multiple calls?
